targets.query:
OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "kube_pod_container_resource_limits"
| extend ResourceType = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["resource"])
| extend PodName = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["pod"])
| extend NamespaceName = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["namespace"])
| where NamespaceName == "${namespace}"
| where PodName == "${pod}"
| where ResourceType == "cpu"
| summarize avg_cpu_util = avg(MetricValue) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), PodName

OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "kube_pod_container_resource_requests"
| extend Container = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["container.name"])
| extend Namespace = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["namespace"])
| extend Pod = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["pod"])
| where Namespace == "${namespace}" and Pod == "${pod}"
| summarize avg(MetricValue) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Container

OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "kube_pod_container_resource_limits"
| extend Container = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["container.name"])
| extend Namespace = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["namespace"])
| extend Pod = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["pod"])
| where Namespace == "${namespace}" and Pod == "${pod}"
| summarize avg(MetricValue) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Container

OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "container.memory.working_set"
| extend Container = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["container.name"])
| extend Namespace = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["k8s.namespace.name"])
| extend Pod = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["k8s.pod.name"])
| where Namespace == "${namespace}" and Pod == "${pod}"
| summarize avg(MetricValue) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Container

OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "container_network_receive_bytes_total"
| extend Pod = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_name"])
| extend Namespace = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_namespace"])
| where Namespace == "${namespace}" and Pod == "${pod}"
| summarize avg(MetricValue) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Pod

| extend Namespace = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_namespace"])
| where Namespace == "${namespace}" and Pod == "${pod}"
| summarize avg(MetricValue) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Pod

| extend Pod = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_name"])
| where Namespace == "${namespace}" and Pod == "${pod}"
| summarize avg(MetricValue) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Container

OTELMetrics

| extend Container = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["container.name"])

| extend Pod = tostring(parse_json(MetricAttributes)["container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_name"])

list.definition:
OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "k8s.pod.cpu.utilization"
| extend NamespaceName = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["k8s.namespace.name"])
| project NamespaceName
list.label: namespace
list.name: namespace

query.query:
OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "k8s.pod.cpu.utilization"
| extend NamespaceName = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["k8s.namespace.name"])
| project NamespaceName

list.definition:
OTELMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where MetricName == "k8s.pod.cpu.utilization"
| extend NamespaceName = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["k8s.namespace.name"])
| extend PodName = tostring(parse_json(ResourceAttributes)["k8s.pod.name"])
| where NamespaceName == "${namespace}"
| project PodName
list.label: pod
list.name: pod
